name: ACT! Database Pointer File
summary: Learn about .PAD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: PAD files are pointers to an ACT! database, not the database itself. Therefore, they do not contain customer relationship data.
NOTE: Sage ACT! became Swiftpage Act! in 2013.

description: Shortcut file used by the ACT! customer relationship management (CRM) software; contains a pointer to the actual ACT! database files, which are stored in .ADF and .ALF files; often used as a desktop shortcut for opening the database.
